about_the_game:
Step into a world on the brink of collapse in Forbidden Offering, an isometric rogue-lite bullet heaven where dark knowledge is your greatest weapon and the end of the world is a looming threat. Carve your path through relentless hordes of monsters with your daring duo, March and Lenore, as they defy fate and challenge the very fabric of their deteriorating reality.

In this crumbling world, the ritual demands the immolation of the girl named Lenore to prevent it from falling apart completely. Yet, young witch March stands defiant, her heart set against this cruel fate. Thus begins their perilous journey to the Last Horizon Threshold, unaware of the true extent of Lenore's mysterious power.

Features

  • Traverse through diverse world pieces, each with unique biomes as the world collapses around you.

  • March gains access to new powers as the story unfolds, evolving her abilities to devastating effect.

  • Unearth ancient relics that bestow new, deadly abilities to aid your quest.

  • Confront formidable bosses guarding each pathway to the Last Horizon Threshold.

  • Wield formidable magic, with a variety of unique spells to master.

  • Build a fast but profound relationship with your otherworldly companion, Lenore, as you journey together.

  • Experience the warmth of companionship and the support of a loyal friend, essential for survival.

  • Scavenge for vital items throughout your journey to aid in your escape from the ominous Red Tower's watchful eyes.

Do not falter on your journey to the world's end; the fate of your world rests in your hands, and your actions may doom it all.

Embark on an unforgettable adventure with cool characters, intense action, and an unbreakable bond of companionship in Forbidden Offering. Will you defy destiny and embrace the end of your world, or will the darkness consume all?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 or Ryzen 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Forbidden Offering is an isometric roguelite survivor game. Stop the dark ritual, carve your path through hordes of monsters, and save the girl. Can you survive the ordeal?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
